definitions.definition: The act or product of transliterating , of representing letters or words in the characters of another alphabet or script .
The act or product of rendering speech in sign language , or vice versa.

main_definition: ( linguistics , translation studies ) The act or product of transliterating , of representing letters or words in the characters of another alphabet or script .
secondary_definitions: ( sign language ) The act or product of rendering speech in sign language , or vice versa.
